widget.name: Word Power
widget.description: If you're looking for an ESL program to teach you basic English words, this is the program for you! Our video dictionary will teach you thousands of words from beginner English vocabulary, to more advanced words. This beginner ESL video series starts with the letter A and works through the alphabet to Z. You'll build your beginner ESL vocabulary with commonly used English words. At the end you will pronounce and use beginner English words in a sentence. Practice with our host, and these English lessons for beginners will help you sound like a native! Start now!
widget.author: Apache Cordova Team
